pkgmetadata.longdescription: Irucka Embry's Miscellaneous USGS Data Collection // A collection of Irucka Embry's miscellaneous USGS data sets (USGS Parameter codes with fixed values, USGS global time zone codes, and US Air Force Global Engineering Weather Data). Irucka created these data sets while a Cherokee Nation Technology Solutions (CNTS) United States Geological Survey (USGS) Contractor and/or USGS employee.
